attributes.action: To supply our injured forces personnell with the latest prosthetics free of charge, regardless of cost.
attributes.additional_details: To supply the latest technologically advanced prosthetics free of charge to any of our forces personnel injured in the service of their country, as is done in the United States of America (our NATO ally).  This should be done regardless of cost as these brave people have made such a huge sacrifice for their country and should not have to rely on charities supporting their needs when they require specialist prosthetics.
